name: Speed Shooting (The Game)
description:
This TAQ Studios very first prototype game. We have no idea if Mac binaries work.

Shoot Targets as fast as you can, and see how fast you can go!

aim at the cone, wait for the beep, and hit the targets!

if you find a bug, please leave it in the comments, and we will try to fix it as soon as we can.

(Warning, the game was developed on 1080p. No other resolutions work currently.)

Developed by TAQ Studios,

FilthyCashew481 - developer

Quebec_Bravo1991 - developer

GaryWilsonjr52 - project tester
